name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of comprehensive experience in cloud-native and microservices architectures. Proficient in **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, and **CI/CD** processes, with a strong track record utilizing **GitLab** and **Argo CD** for streamlined deployments. Adept at monitoring and observability stacks using **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **EFK Stack** to ensure high-performance and reliable application operations. Experienced in implementing infrastructure as code with **Helm**, **Terragrunt**, and managing data with **MongoDB**, **Clickhouse**, and **ElasticSearch**.

Skilled in **AWS** and **GCP** environments, specializing in DevOps practices that enhance automation and efficiency. Background in developing AI/ML-powered platforms that facilitate predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing using **Python** and **Django**. Committed to maintaining compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS while delivering robust solutions.
